meaningMnemonic: A <kanji>samurai</kanji> who uses <kanji>speech</kanji> to <kanji>defend</kanji> people. This samurai does their battle in the court of law. This "samurai" is an <vocabulary>attorney</vocabulary> or a <vocabulary>lawyer</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
